name: game-poc
description: A proof of concept for an HTML5 game with animated sprite character, demonstrating all the core requirements for a responsive, cross-platform game.

scripts.android:init: npm run build && npx cap add android
scripts.android:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:build: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.android:build-debug: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
